20110114010627.000|20110114010628.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC HEALTH     
20110114010628.000|20110114010630.000|CC1|REPORTS THAT THE THREE DEATHS   
20110114010630.000|20110114010633.000|CC1|CAME FROM THE FLU INCLUDES TWO  
20110114010633.000|20110114010635.000|CC1|ADULTS WHOM THEY IDENTIFY AS    
20110114010635.000|20110114010636.000|CC1|OBESE.                          
20110114010636.000|20110114010637.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC HEALTH DEPARTMENT    
20110114010637.000|20110114010640.000|CC1|SAYS IT IS UNKNOWN IF ANY OF    
20110114010640.000|20110114010644.000|CC1|THESE VICTIMS HAD RECEIVED A FLU
20110114010644.000|20110114010646.000|CC1|VACCINATION, BUT THE DEATH OF A 
20110114010646.000|20110114010648.000|CC1|48-YEAR-OLD MAN, A 29-YEAR-OLD  
20110114010648.000|20110114010650.000|CC1|WOMAN AND A 4-YEAR-OLD BOY ARE  
20110114010650.000|20110114010653.000|CC1|THE FIRST FLU DEATHS OF THE     
20110114010653.000|20110114010654.000|CC1|2010-2011 SEASON.               
20110114010654.000|20110114010657.000|CC1|THE ADULTS WERE OBESE, A NEW    
20110114010657.000|20110114010659.000|CC1|RISK FACTOR AND A TROUBLING     
20110114010659.000|20110114010701.000|CC1|WRINKLE IN THE ONGOING EFFORT TO
20110114010701.000|20110114010702.000|CC1|KEEP THE GENERAL POPULATION     
20110114010702.000|20110114010702.000|CC1|SAFE.                           
20110114010702.000|20110114010705.000|CC1|>> I DON'T KNOW THE EXACT       
20110114010705.000|20110114010706.000|CC1|HISTORY.                        
20110114010706.000|20110114010709.000|CC1|OBESITY CAN TEND TO LEAD TO     
20110114010709.000|20110114010712.000|CC1|DIABETES WHICH IS ANOTHER RISK  
20110114010712.000|20110114010714.000|CC1|FACTOR AND BEING COMPROMISED AND
20110114010714.000|20110114010716.000|CC1|CAN TURN INTO A MORE SERIOUS    
20110114010716.000|20110114010718.000|CC1|ILLNESS WHEN YOU OBTAIN THE FLU 
20110114010718.000|20110114010718.000|CC1|VIRUS.                          
20110114010718.000|20110114010720.000|CC1|>> IT IS IMPORTANT FOR PEOPLE TO
20110114010720.000|20110114010723.000|CC1|KNOW JUST BECAUSE THE HOLIDAYS  
20110114010723.000|20110114010724.000|CC1|ARE OVER DOESN'T MEAN THE FLU   
20110114010724.000|20110114010725.000|CC1|SEASON IS OVER.                 
20110114010725.000|20110114010726.000|CC1|WE ARE ENTERING A PERIOD OF     
20110114010726.000|20110114010729.000|CC1|INCREASED ACTIVITY.

20110114010731.000|20110114010733.000|CC1|ARE BLAMED ON VACCINE

20110114010734.000|20110114010736.000|CC1|THE NUMBER OF CASES IS EXPECTED 
20110114010736.000|20110114010738.000|CC1|TO PEAK IN COMING WEEKS.

20110114010741.000|20110114010745.000|CC1|FOR EVERYONE TO GET THE FLU SHOT

20110114010824.000|20110114010826.000|CC1|EARLIER TODAY, I HAVE TO TELL
